message.content: {"given_definition_quality":82,"better_definition":"egg (from a chicken)","sentence":"我有一个鸡蛋。","image_prompt":"A single egg with a soft white shell rests on a table, illuminated by gentle apocalyptic sunlight streaming through a broken window. No people are present.","sentence_translation":"I have an egg."}
